chapter.text: 36|1|ya seen.
36|2|shapath hai sudrdh quraan kee
36|3|vastutah, aap rasoolon mein se hain.
36|4|supath par hain.
36|5|(ye quraan) prabhutvashaalee, ati dayaavaan ka avatarit kiya hua hai.
36|6|taaki aap saavadhaan karen us jaati[1] ko, nahin saavadhaan kiye gaye hain jinake poorvaj. is lie ve achet hain.
36|7|sidhd ho chuka hai vachan[1] unamen se adhiktar logon par. atah, ve eemaan nahin laayenge.
36|8|tatha hamane daal diye hain tauq unake galon mein, jo haddiyon tak[1] hain. isalie ve sir oopar kiye hue hain.
36|9|tatha hamane bana dee hai unake aage ek aad aur unake peechhe ek aad. phir dhaank diya hai unako, to[1] ve dekh nahin rahe hain.
36|10|tatha samaan hai unapar ki aap unhen saavadhaan karen athava saavadhaan na karen, ve eemaan nahin laayenge.
36|11|aap to bas use sachet kar sakenge, jo maane is shiksha (quraan) ko tatha dare atyant krpaasheel se, bin dekhe. to aap shubh soochana suna den use, kshama kee tatha sammaanit pratiphal kee.
36|12|nishchay ham hee jeevit karenge murdon ko tatha likh rahe hain, jo karm unhonne kiya hai aur unake pad chinhon[1] ko tatha pratyek vastu ko hamane gin rakha hai, khulee pustak mein.
36|13|tatha aap unhen[1] ek udaaharan deejiye nagar vaasiyon ka. jab aaye usamen kaee rasool.
36|14|jab hamane bheja unakee or do ko. to unhonne jhuthala diya un donon ko. phir hamane samarthan diya teesare ke dvaara. to teenon ne kahaah ham tumhaaree or bheje gaye hain.
36|15|unhonne kahaah tum sab to manushy hee ho, hamaare[1] samaan aur nahin avatarit kiya hai atyant krpaasheel ne kuchh bhee. tum sab to bas jhooth bol rahe ho.
36|16|un rasoolon ne kahaah hamaara paalanahaar jaanata hai ki vaastav mein ham tumhaaree or rasool banaakar bheje gaye hain.
36|17|tatha hamaara daayitv nahin hai khula upadesh pahuncha dene ke siva.
36|18|unhonne kahaah ham tumhen ashubh samajh rahe hain. yadi tum ruke nahin, to ham tumhen avashy patharaav karake maar daalenge aur tumhen avashy hamaaree or se pahunchegee duhkhadaayee yaatana.
36|19|unhonne kahaah tumhaara ashubh tumhaare saath hai. kya yadi tumhen shiksha dee jaaye (to ashubh samajhate ho)? balki tum ullanghanakaaree jaati ho.
36|20|tatha aaya nagar ke anti kinaare se, ek purush daudata hua. usane kahaah he meree jaati ke logo! anusaran karo rasoolon ka.
36|21|anusaran karo unaka, jo tumase nahin maangate koee paarishramik (badala) tatha ve supath par hain.
36|22|tatha mujhe kya hua hai ki main usakee ibaadat (vandana) na karoon, jisane mujhe paida kiya hai? aur tumasab usee kee or phere jaoge.

36|23|kya main bana loon use chhodakar bahut-se poojy? yadi atyant krpaasheel mujhe koee haani pahunchaana chaahe, to nahin laabh pahoonchaayegee mujhe unakee anushansa (sifaarish) kuchh aur na ve mujhe bacha sakenge.
36|24|vaastav mein, tab to main khule kupath mein hoon.
36|25|nishchay, main eemaan laaya tumhaare paalanahaar par, atah, meree suno.
36|26|(usase) kaha gayaah tum pravesh kar jao svarg mein. usane kahaah kaash meree jaati jaanatee
36|27|jisakaaran kshama[1] kar diya mujhe mere paalanahaar ne aur mujhe sammilit kar diya sammaaniton mein.
36|28|tatha hamane nahin utaaree usakee jaati par usake pashchaat koee sena[1] aakaash se aur na hamen utaarane kee aavashyakta thee.
36|29|vah to bas ek kadee dhvani thee. phir sahasa sabake sab bujh gaye.
36|30|haay santaap hai[1] bhakton par! nahin aaya unake paas rasool, parantu ve usaka upahaas karate rahe.
36|31|kya unhonne nahin dekha ki unase pahale vinaash kar diya bahut-se samudaayon ka. ve unakee or dobaara phirakar nahin aayenge.
36|32|tatha sabake sab hamaare samaksh upasthit kiye[1] jaayenge.
36|33|tatha un[1] ke lie ek nishaanee hai nirjeev (sookhee) dharatee. jise hamane jeevit kar diya aur hamane nikaale usase ann, to tum useemen se khaate ho.
36|34|tatha paida kar diye usamen baag khajooron tatha angooron ke aur phaad diye usamen jal srot.
36|35|taaki ve khaayen usake phal aur nahin banaaya hai use unake haathon ne. to kya ve krtagy nahin hote
36|36|pavitr hai vah, jisane paida kiye pratyek jode, usake jise ugaatee hai dharatee tatha svayan unakee apanee jaati ke aur usake, jise tum nahin jaanate ho.
36|37|tatha ek nishaanee (chinh) hai unake lie raatri. kheench lete hain ham jisase din ko, to sahasa vah andheron mein ho jaate hain.
36|38|tatha soory chala ja raha hai apane nirdhaarit sthaan kee or. ye prabhutvashaalee sarvagy ka nirdhaarit kiya hua hai.
36|39|tatha chandrama ke hamane nirdhaarit kar diye hain gantavy sthaan. yahaantak ki phir vah ho jaata hai puraanee khajoor kee sookhee shaakha ke samaan.
36|40|na to soory ke lie hee uchit hai ki chandrama ko pa jaaye aur na raat agragaamee ho sakatee hai din se. sab ek mandal mein tair rahe hain.
36|41|tatha unake lie ek nishaanee (lakshan) (ye bhee) hai ki hamane savaar kiya unakee santaan ko bharee huee naav mein.
36|42|tatha hamane paida kiya unake lie usake samaan vah cheez, jisapar ve savaar hote hain.
36|43|aur yadi ham chaahen, to unhen jalamagan kar den. to na koee sahaayak hoga unaka aur na ve nikaale (bachaaye) jaayenge.
36|44|parantu, hamaaree daya se tath laabh dene ke lie ek samay tak.
36|45|aur[1] jab unase kaha jaata hai ki daro us (yaatana) se, jo tumhaare aage tatha tumhaare peechhe hai, taaki tumapar daya kee jaaye.
36|46|tatha nahin aatee unake paas koee nishaanee unake paalanahaar kee nishaaniyon mein se, parantu ve usase munh pher lete hain.

36|47|tatha jab unase kaha jaata hai ki daan karo usamen se, jo pradaan kiya hai allaah ne tumhen, to kahate hain jo kaafir ho gaye unase, jo eemaan laaye hain: kya ham use khaana khilaayen, jise yadi allaah chaahe, to khila sakata hai? tumato khule kupath mein ho.
36|48|aur ve kahate hain ki kab ye (pralay) ka vachan poora hoga, yadi tum satyavaadee ho
36|49|vah nahin prateeksha kar rahe hain, parantu ek kadee dhvani[1] kee, jo unhen pakad legee aur vah jhagad rahe honge.
36|50|to na vah koee vasiyyat kar sakenge aur na apane parijanon mein vaapas aa sakenge.
36|51|tatha phoonka[1] jaayega soor (narasingha) mein, to vah sahasa samaadhiyon se apane paalanahaar kee or bhaagate hue chalane lagenge.
36|52|ve kahengeh haay hamaara vinaash! kisane hamen jaga diya hamaare vishraam grh se? ye vo hai, jisaka vachan diya tha atyant krpaasheel ne tatha sach kaha tha rasoolon ne.
36|53|nahin hogee vah, parantu ek kadee dhvani. phir sahasa ve sabake sab, hamaare samaksh upasthit kar diye jaayenge.
36|54|to aaj nahin atyaachaar kiya jaayega kisee praanee par kuchh aur tumhen usee ka pratiphal (badala) diya jaayega, jo tum kar rahe the.
36|55|vaastav mein, svargeey aaj apane aanand mein lage hue hain.
36|56|ve tatha unakee patniyaan saayon mein hain, masnadon par takiye lagaaye hue.
36|57|unake lie usamen pratyek prakaar ke phal hain tatha unake lie vo hai, jisakee ve maang karen.
36|58|(unhen) salaam kaha gaya hai ati dayaavaan paalanahaar kee or se.
36|59|tatha tum alag[1] ho jao aaj, he aparaadhiyo
36|60|he aadam kee santaan! kya mainne tumase bal dekar nahin kaha tha ki ibaadat (vandana) na karana shaitaan kee? vaastav mein, vah tumhaara khula shatru hai.
36|61|tatha ibaadat (vandana) karana meree hee, yahee seedhee dagar hai.
36|62|tatha vah kupath kar chuka hai, tumamen se bahut-se samudaayon ko, to kya tum samajhate nahee ho
36|63|yahee narak hai, jisaka vachan tumhen diya ja raha tha.
36|64|aaj, pravesh kar jao usamen, us kufr ke badale, jo tum kar rahe the.
36|65|aaj, ham muhar (mudra) laga denge unake mukhon par aur hamase baat karenge unake haath tatha saakshy (gavaahee) denge unake pair, unake karmon kee, jo ve kar rahe the.
36|66|aur yadi ham chaahate, to unakee aankhen andhee kar dete. phir ve daudate sangaarg kee or, parantu kahaan se dekhate
36|67|aur yadi ham chaahate, to vikrt kar dete unhen, unake sthaan par, to na ve aage ja sakate the, na peechhe phir sakate the.
36|68|tatha jise ham adhik aayu dete hain, use utpatti mein, pratham dasha[1] kee or pher dete hain. to kya ve samajhate nahin hain
36|69|aur hamane nahin sikhaaya nabee ko kaavy[1] aur na ye unake lie yogy hai. ye to maatr, ek shiksha tatha khula quraan hai.
36|70|taaki vo sachet karen, use jo jeevit ho[1] tatha sidhd ho jaaye yaatana kee baat, kaafiron par.
36|71|kya manushy ne nahin dekha ki hamane paida kiye hain unake lie usamen se, jise banaaya hai hamaare haathon ne chaupaaye. to ve unake svaamee hain
36|72|tatha hamane vash mein kar diya unhen, unake, to unamen se kuchh unakee savaaree hain tatha unamen se kuchh ko ve khaate hain.
36|73|tatha unake lie unamen bahut-se laabh tatha pey hain. to kya (phir bhee) ve krtagy nahin hote
36|74|aur unhonne bana liya allaah ke siva bahut-se poojy ki sambhavatah, ve unakee sahaayata karenge.
36|75|ve svayan apanee sahaayata nahin kar sakenge tatha ve unakee sena hain, (yaatana) mein[1] upasthit.
36|76|atah, aapako udaaseen na kare unakee baat. vastutah, ham jaanate hain, jo ve man mein rakhate hain tatha jo bolate hain.
36|77|aur kya nahin dekha manushy ne ki paida kiya hamane use veery se? phir bhee vah khula jhagadaaloo hai.
36|78|aur usane varnan kiya hamaare lie ek udaaharan, aur apanee utpatti ko bhool gaya. usane kahaah kaun jeevit karega in asthiyon ko, jabaki ve jeern ho chukee hongee
36|79|aap kah den: vahee, jisane paida kiya hai pratham baar aur vah pratyek utpatti ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanane vaala hai.
36|80|jisane bana dee tumhaare lie hare vrksh se agni, to tum usase aag[1] sulagaate ho.
36|81|tatha kya jisane aakaashon tatha dharatee ko paida kiya hai vah saamarthy nahin rakhata isapar ki paida kare usake samaan? kyon nahin jabaki vah rachayita, ati gyaata hai
36|82|usaka aadesh, jab vah kisee cheez ko astitv pradaan karana chaahe, to bas ye kah dena haih ho ja. tatkshan vah ho jaatee hai.
36|83|to pavitr hai vah, jisake haath mein pratyek vastu ka raajy hai aur tumasab usee kee or phere[1] jaoge.
